content.question: In the excerpt above, the melodic motive in measures 1â€“2 is followed by

choices.label: an exact repetition of the motive
a rhythmic diminution of the motive
a transposition of the motive a half-step higher
a transposition of the motive a whole-step higher

content.answer: a transposition of the motive a whole-step higher

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply procedures for melodic and rhythmic transformation in notated music.
